I’ve purchased 5 pairs of these in hopes that the straps would last. I thought maybe I snagged them, so I bought another. The next I assumed was a fluke and after I just kept trying again separate times hoping one pair would last. Sadly not. I wore these one time and before the end of the day, they were ripped again already. I love the pants and style but idk why they don’t sew the straps on better! Definitely can’t machine wash. You can if you turn them inside out but the straps are so weak I don’t recommend it. Finally returning this pair because I don’t need 5 pairs of broken pants 🤦🏻‍♀️

评论概述: They do the job, but could be better
评论详情: I am 5’9, 150 lbs, with an athletic build.  TLDR: no back belt loop, no cargo or back pockets, order a size up for a baggier look  Got these bc i was looking for jogger style cargo pants, which were surprisingly harder to find than i thought. I got a large because I wanted them to be baggier in the legs, and joggers usually fit me too tight if i order in my usual size (medium).  The fit is okay, maybe an inch to wide in the waistband, but its fine bc i usually wear a belt anyway, and now we get into the cons:  There is no belt loop in the back of the pants. Not sure what silly billy had that groundbreaking design idea, as there are front and side belt loops but no belt loop in the back, so i ended up sewing my own on.  These are also not cargo pants, as there are no cargo pockets or back pockets. The only pockets in these “cargs” are the front ones and although they are good deep pockets, you can’t rlly call these cargo pants.
i enjoyed the product and will probably order again.
Ripped after the first wash and sizing is not accurate. Size up 1 or 2 sizes

I liked the fit of these pants, and they were such a cute addition to my outfit I had for a concert. However, after the concert and over the last few days, I’ve noticed I’ve had thick, big rashes against where the fitted part of the pants at the ankles were. They are red and sting a little. If you have sensitive skin, please be aware.

I love these pants. They run true to size and are good for tall girls like me. The material is just right for dancing and is sturdy enough, although; they aren’t real fatigues. I recommend these pants.

评论概述: New fav pants for raves and festivals!!!
评论详情: I'm 5"2 130ish lbs and I'm normally a small/medium in bottoms. A medium fit me exactly how I wanted it too, a little baggy so they stay comfortable but not too big. If you want them more skin tight I recommend going a size down. The main pockets by your hips are deep and the pockets on the side of the thighs are perfect for smaller items. They're lightweight and thin but seem pretty durable. I paired with a cute belt, demonias, rave top and a mesh cover up. I feel so cute in these! They look even better in person tbh.

评论概述: It's not terrible, it's not great.
评论详情: So the sizing is pretty accurate, which is nice. The fabric is quite thin, which I did not expect. The thinness makes it feel like the pants may rip. The straps, however, are the worst. They're not sewn into the pants very effectively, which meant that on my first wear, by just adjusting the straps, the top of them cleany let go of the fabric. I was not violent with them, I was merely tightening the straps a smidge.  I can't fault tge comfortability of the pants, however due to the thinness, I know I won't be avle to wear them in the winter. I maybe also would've preferred buttons to close, instead of one button and a zipper, because the zipper used is incredibly stiff and hard to close.
